sources.title: The Vigilantes Are Coming (1936) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Robert Livingston, Raymond Hatton, Fred Kohler, Yakima Canutt
Directed by: Ray Taylor & Mack V. Wright

A masked hero known as "The Eagle" leads California ranchers in a struggle against Russian Cossacks who are plotting to take over California!

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
01:04     CHAPTER 1: The Eagle Strikes
32:31     CHAPTER 2: Birth of the Vigilantes
53:29     CHAPTER 3: Condemned By Cossacks
1:12:21  CHAPTER 4: Unholy Three
1:29:15  CHAPTER 5: Treachery Unmasked
1:48:23  CHAPTER 6: A Tyrants Trickery
2:06:21  CHAPTER 7: Wings of Doom
2:23:50  CHAPTER 8: A Treaty with Treason
2:41:14  CHAPTER 9: Arrow's Flight
2:59:16  CHAPTER 10: Prison of Flames
3:17:47  CHAPTER 11: A Race with Death
3:33:29  CHAPTER 12: Fremont Takes Command
3:51:24  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: A masked hero called "The Eagle" leads California ranchers in a struggle against Russian Cossacks who are plotting to take over California and turn it into a Russian colony.
metadata.Writer: John Rathmell, Maurice Geraghty, Winston Miller
metadata.Actors: Robert Livingston, Kay Hughes, Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams
